markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Nimble Dodge](/Feats.aspx?ID=550) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 88 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 183 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
A creature targets you with an attack and you can see the attacker.

**Requirements**
You are not encumbered.

</column>

---

You deftly dodge out of the way, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

<title level="2">Nimble Dodge leads to...</title>
[Nimble Roll](/Feats.aspx?ID=574)
name: Nimble Dodge
